name.ja: マジェスペクター・オルト

text.en:
2 Pendulum Monsters, including a "Majespecter" monster
If this card is Link Summoned: You can activate this effect; you cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn, except "Majespecter" and "Dracoslayer" monsters, also add up to 2 face-up "Majespecter" Pendulum Monsters from your Extra Deck to your hand, then you can add up to 2 "Majespecter" Pendulum Monsters with different names from each other from your Deck to your Extra Deck face-up. You can only use this effect of "Majespecter Orthrus - Nue" once per turn.
